attributes.review:
I hate it🤩
This app not only left me blind but also completely obliterated my wanting to remain alive. Trump sweetie, no one likes you💋 My fish also died from loosing braincells when I told him about the app, so I want a new fish. Overall, this is a major breach of human rights, those rights being: saying no to something, and we’re saying NO to this app so BYEEEEE✨🥰❤️💞
xoxo,
gossip girl💋
attributes.title: My fish died because of this app

attributes.review:
This app has so many bugs and spam. I opened the app and suddenly a dancing Cheeto popped up on the screen. As I tried to fix the problem I gave up and figured I would not only delete the app but I would give it a horrible review. So in the most disgusting way possible I bid you 𝓑𝓪𝓭 𝓭𝓪𝔂.
P.S. - do you really think you can overthrow GenZ? We ARE POWERFUL!

xoxo,
           Gossip Girl🧿👄🧿
attributes.title: ✨🧚‍♀️absolutely 𝓉𝑒𝓇𝓇𝒾𝒷𝓁𝑒🧚‍♀️✨

attributes.review: I got the app to support my wonderful orange president 😚✨ but come to opening the app I realize that they are hacking into phones and taking all of our personal information away 😔I for one won’t stand for this and won’t let them keep doing this 😡 I am not one of those people from tiktok and I just don’t like the way the president is handling everything 🍊
attributes.title: Gen Z

attributes.review: i open up this app and i see a cheeto puff lookin man, like, bruh why would this even be an app this is TERRIBLE TERRIBLE. would i get this app again? no! the quality is horrifying and i would never in a million years buy this piece of trash. when up you open up the app there is an ugly man! 😻😻😻😻 i hate it. change it to make it better! ugly no feet for you 🤪 not cool. rename this app!
attributes.title: naw dog 😻

attributes.review: So I’m not apart of the movement to ban trump 😂💀 but I think this app has no business on the app store if 🍊TRUMP🍊WANTS TO BAN TIKTOK like crazy honestly tiktok is prolly more educational than this app 💀 but I downloaded it just as a joke to see wht was goin on in it and I was trying to understand how The President views things and woah all of a sudden my phone grew A PAIR OF FAIRY WINGS 🧚🏻‍♀️💫 and it started vibrating and blew up my turtle so now I have to have a funeral for my turtle :(
attributes.title: IRRITATING

attributes.review: I was walking thru the street and I wanted to open the app to be updated on what news or updates were coming then I was randomly hit in the face confused on the situation my eyes were a blur all I saw was a person with a red hat on then I got knocked out again but I don’t Know maybe is was the soccer jersey I was wearing but I had a crazy migraine after and I blame this app
attributes.title: Garbage

attributes.review: I was told Ian Somerhalder (in case you live under a rock, he’s the hottie from vampire diaries) would come over for the most adorable date but this app is a complete scam. Once I set my information this app continued to send me endless notifications. It was horrible. On top of that I had to keep on seeing a very orange person. Yikes! Most orangey man was not the hottie I was expecting, this guy was....something else 🥴
attributes.title: SOME ORANGE MAN AND NOT IAN SOMERHALDER

attributes.review: Other than the terrible presentation of the app the actual content inside is confusing, abrasive, childish looking, and overall not worth the space in my app or in my life. The point system is ridiculous treating us as if we are kids playing a game. The entire thing just screams out arrogance and shows how dumb he believes we all are.
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review: This app has to delete because this app doesn’t matter for everyone and I hate this app who would even get this app like no we all hate this app is trash just like trump who would even like this app like I would never this app need to be deleted because this I trash and we don’t want to see this app in the App Store anymore deleted this app
attributes.title: Deleted app

attributes.review: this app i terrible do NOT recommend as soon as i downloaded it i just got bad vibes right away then i opened the app and saw like this super orange guy who i can’t tell if it’s trump or an oompa lumpa, or wait a Cheeto? nvm tbh i’m not sure but it rly scared me. then i explored the app and my phone was glitching. also it’s not exiting or fun and the quality is rly crappy... yk what everything on the app is just CRAPPY, EVERYTHING😌😘
attributes.title: THIS APP IS CRAP🧚‍♂️✨💅🏽😍😘
